ca.ualberta.cs.corgFu

Class DataManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cs.corgFu.DataManager

  • public class DataManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a class that handles all of our data, saving each respective type of data in a particular save directory. Whether the type is favorites, cached, read later, my questions or unpushed data
    Author:
    Ahmed

      • saveDataToFile

        public void saveDataToFile(java.util.ArrayList<Question> dataList,
                           java.lang.String choice)
        save and load data from files saves data as an array of questions, the choice indicates if its a favourite, read later, cache respectively
        Parameters:
        dataList - is an array list of Questions for the data being saved
        choice - is the choice name of the file we are saving to

      • loadDataToFile

        public java.util.ArrayList<Question> loadDataToFile(java.lang.String choice)
        load based on choice favourites, cache,read later, unpushed and questions from the files that were saved
        Parameters:
        choice - is the string of the file we are loading from
        Returns:
        the data in the file that we are currently loading from
